00042 void usage(void)
00043 {
00044   std::cout << "Usage: sudoku [options] input_file\n";
00045   std::cout << "\n";
00046   std::cout << "Options:\n";
00047   std::cout << " -a  --show_solution=X       show final board (0-OFF, 1-ON, default is ON).\n";
00048   std::cout << " -b  --basesize=X            the size of the board (e.g. 3, 4, 5, etc. Default is 3)\n";
00049   std::cout << " -c  --clear_screen          clear the screen between boards.\n";
00050   std::cout << " -e  --show_boards_every=X   only show boards after every X iterations.\n";
00051   std::cout << " -h  --help                  display this information.\n";
00052   std::cout << " -m  --show_messages         show all messages (placing, removing, backtracking, etc.\n";
00053   std::cout << " -p  --pause                 pause between moves (press a key to continue).\n";
00054   std::cout << " -s  --show_boards           show boards after placing/removing.\n";
00055   std::cout << " -t  --symbol_type=X         the type of symbols to use, numbers or letters (0 is numbers, 1 is letters)\n";
00056   std::cout << " -w  --show_stats=X          show statistics after each move.\n";
00057   std::cout << "\n";
00058 }

00060 void dump_options(void)
00061 {
00062   std::cout << "     show_solution: " << (SHOW_SOLUTION ? "true" : "false") << std::endl;
00063   std::cout << "          basesize: " << BASESIZE << std::endl;
00064   std::cout << "      clear_screen: " << (CLEAR_SCREEN ? "true" : "false") << std::endl;
00065   std::cout << " show_boards_every: " << SHOW_BOARDS_EVERY << std::endl;
00066   std::cout << "     show_messages: " << (SHOW_MESSAGES ? "true" : "false") << std::endl;
00067   std::cout << "             pause: " << (PAUSE ? "true" : "false") << std::endl;
00068   std::cout << "       show_boards: " << (SHOW_BOARDS ? "true" : "false") << std::endl;
00069   std::cout << "       symbol_type: " << (SYMBOL_TYPE == Sudoku::SYM_NUMBER ? "Numbers" : "Letters") << std::endl;
00070   std::cout << "        show_stats: " << (SHOW_STATS ? "true" : "false") << std::endl;
00071   std::cout << "          filename: " << gFile << std::endl;
00072 }

00074 void parse_commandline(int argc, char **argv)
00075 {
00076   int fail = 0;
00077   int option_index = 0;
00078 
00079   static struct option long_options[] = 
00080   {
00081 
00082     {"show_solution",     required_argument, NULL, 'a'},
00083     {"basesize",          required_argument, NULL, 'b'},
00084     {"clear_screen",      no_argument,       NULL, 'c'},
00085     {"show_boards_every", required_argument, NULL, 'e'},
00086     {"help",              no_argument,       NULL, 'h'},
00087     {"show_messages",     no_argument,       NULL, 'm'},
00088     {"pause",             no_argument,       NULL, 'p'},
00089     {"show_boards",       no_argument,       NULL, 's'},
00090     {"symbol_type",       required_argument, NULL, 't'},
00091     {"show_stats",        no_argument,       NULL, 'w'},
00092     {NULL,                 0,                NULL, 0}
00093   };
00094 
00095   optind = 1;
00096   for(;;)
00097   {
00098     int opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, "-:a:b:ce:hmpst:w", long_options, &option_index);
00099 
00100     if (opt == -1)
00101       break;
00102 
00103     switch (opt) 
00104     {
00105       case 0: /* long option */
00106         /*
00107         printf("long option %s", long_options[option_index].name);
00108         if (optarg)
00109            printf(" with arg %s", optarg);
00110         printf("\n");
00111         */
00112         break;
00113 
00114       case 'a':
00115         if (std::atoi(optarg))
00116           SHOW_SOLUTION = true;
00117         break;
00118       case 'b':
00119         BASESIZE = std::atoi(optarg);
00120         break;
00121       case 'c':
00122         CLEAR_SCREEN = true;
00123         break;
00124       case 'e':
00125         if (std::atoi(optarg))
00126           SHOW_BOARDS_EVERY = true;
00127         else
00128           SHOW_BOARDS_EVERY = false;
00129         break;
00130       case 'h':
00131         usage();
00132         std::exit(0);
00133       case 'm':
00134         SHOW_MESSAGES = true;
00135         break;
00136       case 'p':
00137         PAUSE = true;
00138         break;
00139       case 's':
00140         SHOW_BOARDS = true;
00141         break;
00142       case 't':
00143         if (std::atoi(optarg))
00144           SYMBOL_TYPE = Sudoku::SYM_LETTER;
00145         else
00146           SYMBOL_TYPE = Sudoku::SYM_NUMBER;
00147         break;
00148       case 'w':
00149         SHOW_STATS = true;
00150         break;
00151       case '?':
00152         std::cout << "Unknown option: " << optopt << std::endl;
00153         fail = 1;
00154         break;
00155       case ':':
00156         std::cout << "Missing option for " << optopt << std::endl;
00157         fail = 1;
00158         break;
00159       case 1:
00160         std::strcpy(gFile, optarg);
00161         break;
00162     }
00163   }
00164 
00165   if (fail)
00166   {
00167     usage();
00168     std::exit(-1);
00169   }
00170 }

00172 void PrintStats(const Sudoku& board)
00173 {
00174   Sudoku::SudokuStats stats = board.GetStats();
00175   std::cout << "  Basesize: " << stats.basesize << std::endl;
00176   std::cout << "     Moves: " << stats.moves << std::endl;
00177   std::cout << "    Placed: " << stats.placed << std::endl;
00178   std::cout << "Backtracks: " << stats.backtracks << std::endl;
00179   std::cout << "  Filename: " << gFile << std::endl;
00180 }

00182 void DumpBoard(const char *board, int basesize, size_t moves)
00183 {
00184   int blocksize = basesize * basesize;
00185   std::cout << "Moves: " << moves << std::endl;
00186 
00187     // two spaces for each symbol
00188   int len = (blocksize * 2) + (basesize * 2) + 1;
00189 
00190     // print top horizontal line with - and + in the appropriate locations
00191   for (int k = 0; k < len; k++)
00192   {
00193     if ( (k == 0) || !(k % (2 * basesize + 2)))
00194       std::cout << "+";
00195     else
00196       std::cout << "-";
00197   }
00198   std::cout << std::endl;
00199 
00200   int count = 0;
00201   for (int i = 0; i < blocksize * blocksize - 1; i += blocksize)
00202   {
00203     std::cout << "|";
00204     for (int j = 0; j < basesize; j++)
00205     {
00206       for (int k = 0; k < basesize; k++)
00207       {
00208         std::cout << std::setw(2) << board[i + j * basesize + k + 0];
00209       }
00210       std::cout << " |";
00211       //if (j && ((j == 2) || (j == 5) || (j == 8)) )
00212     }
00213     std::cout << std::endl;
00214 
00215     count++;
00216 
00217       // print horizontal lines with - and + in the appropriate locations
00218       // after each 'set' of symbols
00219     if (!(count % basesize))
00220     {
00221       for (int k = 0; k < len; k++)
00222       {
00223         if ( (k == 0) || !(k % (2 * basesize + 2)))
00224           std::cout << "+";
00225         else
00226           std::cout << "-";
00227       }
00228       std::cout << std::endl;
00229     }
00230   }
00231 }

00233 void Pause(void)
00234 {
00235   if (ABORTED)
00236     return;
00237 
00238   if (std::fgetc(stdin) == 'x')
00239   {
00240     std::cout << "User abort.\n";
00241     ABORTED = true;
00242     //std::exit(1);
00243   }
00244 }
00245 
00246 struct RowCol
00247 {
00248   int row;
00249   int col;
00250 };
00251 
00252 int index_to_row(int index, int basesize)
00253 {
00254   return index / (basesize * basesize);
00255 }
00256 
00257 int index_to_col(int index, int basesize)
00258 {
00259   return index % (basesize * basesize);
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 RowCol IndexToRowCol(int index, int basesize)
00264 {
00265   RowCol rc;
00266   rc.row = index_to_row(index, basesize);
00267   rc.col = index_to_col(index, basesize);
00268   return rc;
00269 }
00270 
00271 void DisplayDuplicates(int *duplicates, int basesize)
00272 {
00273   //std::cout << duplicates[0] << "," << duplicates[1] << "," << duplicates[2] << std::endl;
00274   if (duplicates[0] == -1 && duplicates[1] == -1 && duplicates[2] == -1)
00275     return;
00276 
00277   RowCol rc;
00278   std::cout << "Duplicates: ";
00279   int count = 0;
00280   if (duplicates[0] != -1)
00281   {
00282     rc = IndexToRowCol(duplicates[0], basesize);
00283     std::cout << "#" << ++count << " at cell " << duplicates[0] << " (" << rc.row + 1 << "," << rc.col + 1 << ") ";
00284   }
00285   if (duplicates[1] != -1)
00286   {
00287     rc = IndexToRowCol(duplicates[1], basesize);
00288     std::cout << "#" << ++count << " at cell " << duplicates[1] << " (" << rc.row + 1 << "," << rc.col + 1 << ") ";
00289   }
00290   if (duplicates[2] != -1)
00291   {
00292     rc = IndexToRowCol(duplicates[2], basesize);
00293     std::cout << "#" << ++count << " at cell " << duplicates[2] << " (" << rc.row + 1 << "," << rc.col + 1 << ") ";
00294   }
00295 }
00296 
00297 bool Callback(const Sudoku& sudoku, const char *board, Sudoku::MessageType message, 
00298               size_t move, int basesize, int index, char symbol, int *duplicates)
00299 {
00300   if (CLEAR_SCREEN && message != Sudoku::MSG_ABORT_CHECK)
00301     #if defined (__GNUC__)
00302     if (std::system("clear"))
00303     #else
00304     if (std::system("cls"))
00305     #endif
00306       std::exit(0);
00307 
00308   switch (message)
00309   {
00310     case Sudoku::MSG_STARTING:
00311       if (SHOW_MESSAGES)
00312         std::cout << "Starting... \n";
00313       DumpBoard(board, basesize, move);
00314       if (SHOW_STATS)
00315         PrintStats(sudoku);
00316       std::cout << std::endl;
00317     break;
00318 
00319     case Sudoku::MSG_PLACING:
00320       if (SHOW_MESSAGES)
00321       {
00322         RowCol rc = IndexToRowCol(index, basesize);
00323         std::cout << "Move: " << move << ", Placing " << symbol << " at " << rc.row + 1 
00324                   << "," << rc.col + 1 << " (cell: " << index + 1 << ").";
00325         std::cout << "  ";
00326         DisplayDuplicates(duplicates, basesize);
00327         std::cout << std::endl;
00328       }
00329       if (SHOW_BOARDS)
00330       {
00331         if (!(move % SHOW_BOARDS_EVERY))
00332         {
00333           DumpBoard(board, basesize, move);
00334           if (SHOW_STATS)
00335             PrintStats(sudoku);
00336           std::cout << std::endl;
00337         }
00338       }
00339       break;
00340 
00341     case Sudoku::MSG_REMOVING:
00342       if (SHOW_MESSAGES)
00343       {
00344         RowCol rc = IndexToRowCol(index, basesize);
00345         std::cout << "Move: " << move << ", Removing " << symbol << " from " << rc.row + 1 << "," 
00346                   << rc.col + 1 << " (cell: " << index + 1 << ").\n";
00347       }
00348       if (SHOW_BOARDS)
00349       {
00350         if (!(move % SHOW_BOARDS_EVERY))
00351         {
00352           DumpBoard(board, basesize, move);
00353           if (SHOW_STATS)
00354             PrintStats(sudoku);
00355           std::cout << std::endl;
00356         }
00357       }
00358       break;
00359 
00360     case Sudoku::MSG_FINISHED_OK:
00361       std::cout << "Solution found in " << move << " moves.\n";
00362       if (SHOW_SOLUTION)
00363         DumpBoard(board, basesize, move);
00364       break;
00365 
00366     case Sudoku::MSG_FINISHED_FAIL:
00367       std::cout << "No solution found after " << move << " moves\n";
00368       break;
00369 
00370     case Sudoku::MSG_ABORT_CHECK:
00371       if (ABORTED)
00372         return true;
00373       break;
00374 
00375     default:
00376       std::cout << "Unknown message.\n";
00377   }
00378 
00379   if (PAUSE)
00380     Pause();
00381 
00382   return false;
00383 }
00384 
00385 void stripnl(char *line)
00386 {
00387   size_t len = std::strlen(line);
00388   line[len - 1] = 0;
00389 }
00390 
00391 void acquire_board(const char *filename)
00392 {
00393   std::FILE *fp = std::fopen(filename, "rt");
00394   if (!fp)
00395   {
00396     std::cout << "Failed to open " << filename << " for input.\n";
00397     std::exit(-1);
00398   }
00399 
00400     // TODO: Allocate dynamically 
00401   char buffer[MAX_BOARD_SIZE];
00402   while (!std::feof(fp))
00403   {
00404     if (std::fgets(buffer, MAX_BOARD_SIZE, fp) == NULL)
00405       break;
00406 
00407       // skip comments (if any)
00408     if (buffer[0] == '#')
00409       continue;
00410 
00411     stripnl(buffer);
00412     gBoard = new char[strlen(buffer) + 1];
00413     std::strcpy(gBoard, buffer);
00414 
00415       // Currently, there is only 1 board per file
00416     break;
00417   }
00418   std::fclose(fp);
00419 }
00420 
00421 typedef void (*TestFn)(void);
00422 
00423 void ExecuteTest(TestFn fn, int maxwait = 1000, int safewait = 1000)
00424 {
00425   if (maxwait + safewait > 0)
00426     fn();
00427 }
00428 
00429 void RunTest()
00430 {
00431   acquire_board(gFile);
00432   Sudoku board(BASESIZE, SYMBOL_TYPE, Callback);
00433   board.SetupBoard(gBoard, static_cast<int>(std::strlen(gBoard)));
00434   
00435   std::cout << "\n==================== ";
00436   std::cout << "Board: [" << BASESIZE << "x" << BASESIZE << "]" << gFile; 
00437   std::cout << " ====================\n";
00438   board.Solve();
00439   PrintStats(board);
00440   std::cout << std::endl;
00441 
00442   delete [] gBoard;
00443 }

00446 //****************************************************************************************************
00447 //****************************************************************************************************
00448 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00449 {
00450   parse_commandline(argc, argv);
00451   //dump_options();
00452   if (!std::strlen(gFile))
00453   {
00454     usage();
00455     std::exit(1);
00456   }
00457 
00458   struct TimedTest
00459   {
00460     void (*test)(void);
00461     int maxwait;
00462     int safewait;
00463   };
00464   
00465   int max = 500;
00466   int safe = 500;
00467   TimedTest Test = {RunTest, max, safe};
00468 
00469   ExecuteTest(Test.test, Test.maxwait, Test.safewait);
00470 
00471   return 0;
00472 }
